title: Trump and the Easter Bunny, Mueller Report Revelations & Everything Is Stupid | Amanda Nguyen
itunes:title: Trump and the Easter Bunny, Mueller Report Revelations & Everything Is Stupid | Amanda Nguyen
description:
The Mueller report portrays a White House in full panic mode, Ronny Chieng is unimpressed by anti-climate change proposals, and Rise CEO Amanda Nguyen sits down with Trevor.
